name: Establishment Wreck
description:
NARRATIVE AND FEATURE LIST

Tired of working sixteen hours a day? Tired of being considered a mere number among many? Tired of having a gun in the desk drawer and not using it?

Take your weapons and fight for your freedom, escaping from a huge multinational while slowly descending into madness.

FEATURES:

  • 4 weapons to unlock through the levels
  • Dash and crouch
  • 3 levels 
  • 3 types of enemies: policeman, security camera, security guard
  • Friendly workers around the map, be careful to not shoot them! 

DEVELOPED BY:

TEAM X

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2020/2021)

Programming:

  • Filippo Bestoso

Game Design:

  • Samuel Frescura
  • Lorenzo Fontana

3D Art:

  • Eleonora Germano

Concept Art:

  • Gaia Negri
